org.ossnipes.snipes.lib.irc
Interface BotConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
BotUtils, ExampleBot, IRCBase, SnipesSocketFactory, SnipesSSLSocketFactory
public interface BotConstants

Interface for all bot constants (bot constants are constants that are not IRC response codes)

Since:
Snipes 0.6

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_NICK
          The default nick (you know what a nick is :P) if it has not been set
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_REALNAME
          The default realname for the bot if it has not been set
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_USER
          The default username (before the @ and after the ! in the hostname) if it has not been set.
static Event[] INT_EVENTS
          The set of events that need handling by the bot framework itself, along with possibly the user.
static char[] IRC_CHANPREFIXES
           
static int IRC_DEFAULT_PORT
          The default port for IRC servers
static int IRC_TIMEOUT
          The IRC server timeout in milliseconds
static float SNIRC_VERSION
          The float-represented version of the Snipes IRC library
static java.lang.String SNIRC_VERSION_STRING
          The String representation of SNIRC_VERSION
